code: export var sendToServer=function sendToServer(foodname,foodimage){var backend='http://localhost:8080';var xhttp=new XMLHttpRequest();xhttp.open("POST",backend+'/api/meals',true);var request={'mealName':foodname,'mealPhoto':foodimage};xhttp.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/json');xhttp.send(JSON.stringify(request));};
